job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
     * Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
     * Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
     * Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
     * Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
     * Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Pipeline Engineer/Head

* In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
     * Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
     * Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
     * Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
     * Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
     * Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on rendering technology, creative tooling, and pipeline development for artistic teams, rather than core AI/ML model development or deployment. While it mentions 'automation' and 'deploy frequent changes', it lacks specific AI/ML tasks or technologies.

phrases: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform
Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches
Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business/project goals (next version of rendering tech), align technical decisions with broader strategy (define future architecture), and translate needs of non-technical stakeholders (artists) into technical solutions.

phrases: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software)
define the future architecture of our technology platform
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
implement directly
job_tasks.justification: The description involves developing and running software (rendering technology, end-user software), defining architecture, and building/deploying changes, which are core software development activities.

phrases: run the next version of our rendering technology
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'run', 'test', and 'deploy' suggests operational aspects of managing and maintaining the developed pipeline technology.

phrases: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
Collaborating with our artists
soft_skills.justification: Multiple instances of 'collaboration' and 'working with' different teams (CTO, technical, artistic, Grip development) highlight the importance of communication and teamwork.

phrases: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices
identify shared (technical) approaches
develop the tools and automation they need
soft_skills.justification: The role requires defining technology, making choices, identifying solutions, and developing tools to meet specific needs, indicating problem-solving and a pragmatic approach to delivering functionality.

phrases: Lead Pipeline Engineer/Head
define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform
soft_skills.justification: The 'Lead' title and responsibilities for defining the 'next version' and 'future architecture' suggest a need for initiative, ownership, and driving innovation in the pipeline technology.

phrases: run the next version of our rendering technology
define the future architecture of our technology platform
pick up enhancements and implement directly
soft_skills.justification: The need to define future architecture and implement enhancements implies a requirement to learn and adapt to evolving technology and project needs.
